dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Oriented with north toward upper left.
Shows city plan, roads, waterways, topography, graveyards, "Old Levee."
Features American River and Sacramento River.
Appears in Barber & Baker's Sacramento illustrated, Sacramento, 1855.
